abstract.text: A powerful, type-safe Swift SDK for the OpenAI API with support for all major endpoints and platforms.

inlineContent.text: OpenAIKit provides a comprehensive, Swift-native interface to OpenAI‚Äôs API, featuring:
: Built with async/await, Sendable conformance, and type safety
: Supports iOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, visionOS, and Linux
: Built-in authentication and secure API key management
: Server-Sent Events support for streaming responses
: Strongly typed requests and responses with comprehensive error handling
: Pure Swift implementation with no external dependencies
: Advanced research and analysis capabilities for complex queries
Add OpenAIKit to your project using Swift Package Manager:

code: ChatMessage(role: .system, content: "You are a helpful assistant."),
ChatMessage(role: .user, content: "Explain quantum computing in simple terms.")
